meanings.definition: One who tags or labels something.
meanings.sent1: The tagger carefully labeled each box in the storage room.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the tagger to put names on all the folders.
meanings.sent3: The tagger mistakenly put the wrong label on the lunch boxes.
meanings.sent4: The tagger was like a human label maker, organizing everything in sight.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous tagger made sure every item was properly marked.

meanings.definition: A graffiti artist who creates tags.
meanings.sent1: The tagger sprayed colorful designs on the city walls.
meanings.sent2: The police caught the tagger in the act of painting graffiti.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous tagger left his mark on the train station.
meanings.sent4: The tagger's art transformed dull walls into vibrant masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The talented tagger's work was admired by many passersby.

meanings.definition: A player in a game of tag.
meanings.sent1: The tagger chased after the other kids during recess.
meanings.sent2: The tagger tried to tag as many friends as possible.
meanings.sent3: The tagger laughed as they tagged someone who wasn't looking.
meanings.sent4: The tagger's speed made them the ultimate champion of tag.
meanings.sent5: The tagger's strategy of hiding behind trees was quite clever.
